Transportation Benefit Claim Received With or After the SC Burial Allowance is Paid for Deaths on or After January 5, 2023
PL 116-315
significantly impacted when the transportation benefit may be paid.  For deaths that occurred on or after January 5, 2023, any claimant who would be eligible to receive the NSC burial allowance based on a Veteran’s death may also be
eligible
for the transportation benefit if they incurred transportation expenses.  This is true even when the SC burial allowance was paid as the greater benefit.
Reference
:  For more information on the transportation benefit, including guidance for deaths that occurred before January 5, 2023, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.B.6
.
